word: "So when the Samaritans were come unto Him, they besought Him that He would tarry with them; and He abode there two days." And what busy days these were! What is the record of the result?--"And many more believed because of His own word; and said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying; for we have heard Him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world." John 4:40-42.
